sentences.sContent: They were involved in illegal activities.
...the municipal government also plans to build a number of water-recycling plants and to prohibit illegal constructions...

...The very thought of formulating immigration laws from the standpoint of what is best for the American people seems to have been forgotten by many who focus on how to solve the problems of illegal immigration...
...Why do native low-skilled workers suffer most from illegal immigration...
...At the heart of the debate over illegal immigration lies one key question: are immigrants good or bad for the economy...
...As for the drawbacks of illegal immigration...
...Many countries have made it illegal to chat into a hand-held mobile phone while driving...

synos.tran: [法]非法的；违法的；违反规则的

remMethod.val: il(不， 非) ＋ legal(合法的) → 不合法的
